title: New: Parlours – Dreamers
content:
Spending two weeks in sunny Spain made me realise just how much of a let-down the UK ‘summer’ months have been.

So with that in mind, let me introduce you to an ode to ‘the summer that never was’, and a track that’s fully deserving of being a festival anthem at some point in the near future. Parlours, a dream-pop five piece hailing from Des Moines just released their new album All Is Here, and Dreamers is one of the standout tracks from the LP. Brilliantly vibrant and overflowing with youthful confidence and adolescent lust, all centered around a chart-ready hook, Parlours have all the makings of a very successful band.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
